title: Plate
description: plate divided into four panels, two with floral sprays on black and two with romantic scenes on white ground, panels seperated by bands of spirals in gold over glaze, scalloped edge with band of gold spirals and latticed panels, in the center a medallion with bud spray on white ground, rim chipped.  Dia. 7-7/8 in.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. C. Bovey
